txt.en: 'Thank you for all you have done for us, [placeholder]. There is one more danger that I am aware of: Esgaroth.'
Lorndúr has told you of several problems plaguing trade on the Forest River. Help the raft-elves so they can return to trade upon the water!
Lorndúr can be found in Loeglond.\n\nYou should talk to Lorndúr.
Lorndúr can be found in Loeglond.\n\nYou should complete quests for Lorndúr.
Complete: Trouble Comes Down the Mountain

'We should begin with troubles along the Forest River. Shipments are sent downstream from Felegoth, and then picked up here in Loeglond before being sent off to the Long Lake. Not long ago, shipments began going missing before even reaching us. I suspect Orcs are involved. Please do what you can to make the Forest River safer for us.'
